titleStmt.title: An exact list of the royal confederate army in Flanders, commanded by the King of Great-Britain, in four lines, as it was drawn up at Gerpines-Camp, July 27, 1691. VVith the different colours of cloathing, by which each regiment is distinguished.

publicationStmt.publisher: by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: sheet creased, with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
